zh.name: VIVIAN WANG
zh.role: 化妆总监 | VIVIAN CELEBRITY 创始人
zh.bio:
资深影视与时尚，专注中英及国际项目：
• 英国电影电视剧造型总监
• 加拿大电影服化道总执行
• 尚美巴黎（Chaumet）高珠晚宴、时装周秀场及明星红毯特邀合作造型总监
• 服务领域：电影制作、短剧、综艺、广告、时尚、婚礼定制、高端定制、明星同款旅拍

en.name: Vivian Wang
en.role: Makeup Director | Founder of VIVIAN CELEBRITY
en.bio:
Experienced in film and fashion, specialized in Chinese/English and international projects:
• Chief Styling Director for UK films and TV series
• Executive Head of Costume & Makeup Department for Canadian films
• Specially invited Styling Director for Chaumet high jewelry gala, fashion week shows, and celebrity red carpets
• Services: film production, short dramas, variety shows, commercials, fashion, wedding couture, bespoke shoots, celebrity-style travel shoots

zh.name: Hao
zh.bio:
明星一线摄影师 Hao，以其极具辨识度的高级质感与定制化影像风格著称。多年来深耕时尚与艺人拍摄领域，他善于通过光影与细节的精准把控，将人物的独特气质与情绪完整还原，呈现出自然却极具艺术感的画面。

Hao 的作品注重高端质感的营造，既有杂志大片的视觉冲击力，又兼具肖像摄影的真实与细腻。他始终坚持为每一位客户量身定制影像方案，让每一张照片不仅是一幅画面，更是个人故事与风格的延伸。

凭借丰富的实战经验与敏锐的审美视角，Hao 的影像作品常在简约与精致之间找到平衡，既符合国际时尚标准，又具备独特的个人符号。他的摄影不仅是一种记录，更是一场高定艺术体验，为客户打造具备收藏价值与传播力的视觉作品。

en.name: Hao
en.bio:
Top-tier celebrity photographer Hao is known for a distinctive premium finish and bespoke visual style. Over years in fashion and artist portraiture, he precisely shapes light and detail to restore each subject’s unique temperament and emotion, delivering images that feel natural yet artistically refined.

His work emphasizes a high-end look: it carries the visual impact of magazine editorials while retaining the authenticity and subtlety of portraiture. He tailors a visual plan for every client so each photograph is not merely an image but an extension of personal story and style.

With extensive field experience and a sharp aesthetic sense, Hao balances simplicity with sophistication, meeting international fashion standards while maintaining a recognizable personal signature. His photography is not just documentation but a couture art experience, creating visuals with collectible value and communication power.

zh.name: Jade
zh.bio:
• 专注于电影与时尚影像创作，擅长情绪光影捕捉与人物表达，网感风格 MV。
• 熟练操作专业设备，包括 SONY/ARRI 系列摄影机、DJI Ronin 稳定器及专业影视灯光系统。
• 作品风格兼具叙事性与视觉张力，兼顾美学与商业传播需求。
• 短片荣获英国皇家电视协会 RTS Award 最佳影片，受到业内高度认可。
• 目前正进行导演项目研究，持续探索影像与造型艺术的融合表达。

en.name: Jade
en.bio:
• Specializes in film and fashion visuals; adept at mood-driven lighting and human expression; social-forward MV aesthetics.
• Proficient with SONY/ARRI cinema cameras, DJI Ronin gimbals, and professional lighting systems.
• Narrative-driven style with strong visual tension; balances aesthetics and commercial communication.
• Short film awarded Best Film by the Royal Television Society (RTS); widely recognized in the industry.
• Currently researching directing projects, exploring the fusion of imagery and styling.

zh.name: Elf
zh.role: 摄影师｜英国创意艺术大学时尚摄影客座讲师
zh.bio:
拥有 8 年丰富经验，专注于时尚摄影、商业摄影及时尚短片创作。她不仅是摄影师，同时也是优秀的制片人、导演、艺术总监和摄影指导。凭借独特的视觉语言和叙事风格，她与众多国际一线品牌、知名杂志及明星艺人合作。

在时尚短片领域，婉蓉同时担任导演与制片人，擅长运用 3D、XR 及 AI 视觉特效，将抽象美学融入叙事，为品牌打造沉浸式影像体验，赋予商业广告与时尚影像更强的视觉冲击与情感共鸣。

代表作多次入选国际艺术与影像展览：
• 个人摄影集《WANRONG ZHU 2018-2022》于伦敦泰特现代美术馆展出（2024）
• 《Symphony of Shadows》入围 Colección SOLO AI AWARD 2024 十强
• 《A Murder》入选 WomenCinemakers Biennale 2024 官方展映

en.name: Elf
en.role: Photographer | Visiting Lecturer in Fashion Photography (UCA)
en.bio:
With 8 years of experience, Elf focuses on fashion and commercial photography, as well as fashion short films. Beyond photography, she also works as producer, director, art director, and DP. With a distinctive visual language and narrative approach, she collaborates with international top brands, renowned magazines, and celebrity talents.

In fashion shorts, she often serves as both director and producer, leveraging 3D, XR, and AI VFX to fuse abstract aesthetics with narrative, crafting immersive brand experiences that heighten impact and emotional resonance.

Selected works and exhibitions:
• Photobook ‘WANRONG ZHU 2018–2022’ exhibited at Tate Modern, London (2024)
• ‘Symphony of Shadows’ – Top 10, Colección SOLO AI AWARD 2024
• ‘A Murder’ – Official Selection, WomenCinemakers Biennale 2024

zh.name: Patrick Xue
zh.role: 摄影师｜影像艺术创作者
zh.bio:
• 专注于动态图像与传统摄影媒介实践。
• 擅长拍摄胶片、撕拉片（Polaroid/FP）、宝丽来，以及具有故事性的叙事型 MV。
• 以手工工艺与材质肌理塑造时间感与情绪张力；创作融合即时影像与暗房实验，强调个体经验、文本思考与哲学意象之间的对话。
• 构建富有诗意与深度的视觉语言，作品聚焦于图像、记忆与个体叙事的交织表达。

en.name: Patrick Xue
en.bio:
• Focused on motion imagery and traditional photographic media.
• Skilled in film, peel-apart Polaroid (FP), instant photography, and narrative music videos.
• Uses handcrafted processes and material textures to sculpt a sense of time and emotional tension; blends instant image-making with darkroom experiments, emphasizing dialogue among personal experience, texts, and philosophical imagery.
• Builds a poetic, in-depth visual language centered on the interplay of image, memory, and individual narrative.

zh.name: Kris
zh.bio:
专注于以富士影像语言构建情绪与色彩的诗意表达。

• 擅长在自然光与城市肌理之间捕捉人物的真实状态，作品融合东方留白与西式构图，细腻而富有质感。
• 以轻便的富士系统为载体，探索光影与色温的边界，构建出具有时间感与故事性的画面语言。
• 无论是街头偶遇还是定制肖像，他始终追求影像的克制之美与叙事张力。

en.name: Kris
en.bio:
Focuses on poetic expressions of mood and color through the Fujifilm system.

• Captures authentic human states between natural light and urban textures; merges Eastern negative space with Western composition—subtle and tactile.
• Explores the boundaries of light and color temperature to craft frames with time and story.
• From street encounters to bespoke portraits, always pursues restrained beauty and narrative tension.

zh.name: Fu
zh.bio:
Fu 是一位擅长以色彩与情绪叙事构建影像语言的视觉创作者。他的作品游走于自然光与城市肌理之间，擅长捕捉人物最真实动人的状态，镜头下常带有静谧的诗意与克制的美学。

他熟练掌握富士系统对光影与色温的极致表现，善于利用其灵活便携的特性打造充满时间质感与留白美感的画面。同时，他也精通佳能高清系统，在需要锐利质感、高动态范围与专业商业用途的场景中，以 Canon 的影像语言实现更高规格的视觉输出。

无论是街头邂逅的即兴拍摄，还是为客户量身定制的人像肖像，Fu 都致力于打造具备叙事张力与视觉记忆点的作品。他坚信：真正动人的影像，是光影、情绪与构图在一瞬间的平衡。

en.name: Fu
en.bio:
Fu is a visual creator adept at constructing a photographic language through color and emotion. Moving between natural light and urban textures, he captures the most genuine and stirring states of people; his images carry a serene poetry and restrained aesthetics.

He masters the Fujifilm system for the utmost in light and color expression, leveraging its portability to craft frames with a palpable sense of time and negative space. He is also proficient with Canon for scenarios that demand crisp rendition, high dynamic range, and professional commercial output.

From spontaneous street sessions to bespoke portrait commissions, Fu aims for works with narrative tension and memorable visual signatures. He believes the most moving imagery is the instant balance of light, emotion, and composition.
